name: Ghospers Game
description: Ghospers is a 3D magic-based PvP / PvE sandbox, play-to-earn game where you can fight other Ghospers and use $GHSP tokens to purchase land, housing, clothing, and other fun things around Ghostalia! It is made by the Developer Ghost Ivy. Backed by Bluezilla, Gamezone and NFTLaunch.
